data.text:
@joe_sill This is an extreme case of confirmation bias. :-)

Seems to be prevalent in the antivax/pro-Trump/pro-Brexit/pro-Boris Johnson/covid+net zero-denial/Putin apologist 'community'. :-/
@joe_sill @thereal_truther I mean there’s a handful of states that didn’t take many/any measures but only one that hired these knuckleheads

@JMiaMoo @thereal_truther It's probably because Florida's age-adjusted death numbers don't look too bad IF you are unaware of (or choose to ignore) the effect of air moisture on covid spread. So Brownstone/GBD types love to claim FL 'got it right' while ignoring TX, most of the rest of the south, etc..
@thereal_truther @joe_sill I keep saying it but how the hell did Team Brownstone latch on so hard to RD and not Trump?
@thereal_truther @2cities2worlds @joe_sill Isn’t that the same thing I just said?  😏
@2cities2worlds @joe_sill @thereal_truther What is his actual purpose?  Social media data communications?
